name: Ryan Muller's projects
body:
### Ryan Muller
I'm a PhD student at the Human Computer Interaction Institute at Carnegie Mellon University. My goal is to understand and design web-based environments where natural learning flourishes. 

[Google+](https://plus.google.com/115760070275187482798)
[Twitter](http://twitter.com/cicatriz)
